name: Before After Content
author: Shamim Imtiaz

sections.description:
Before After plugin is designed to give you accessibility with your content’s before and after section. You can use the before section or after section or both at same time. You can select if it will work only for single blog page or only for pages or both. It will not work for shop page or portfolio or other custom post type.
You can use tinymce and linkable image so you can use this plugin for advertisement also. You have also custom design option too.

Main Features

  • Controll before/after section
  • Responsive
  • Linkable image banner
  • Image alignment with size control
  • Box design for text message
  • Design control for text message
  • Lightweight
  • Easy installation.
sections.installation:
Installing this plugin as regular wordpress plugin.
This plugin is dependent on Titan framework. Please download that plugin and activate.
After that, you can see a menu named B/A Content. You can change settings form here.
sections.faq:
Why I need Titan Framework?

This option framework has been used to manage the style and content. I have a plan to remove this dependency in my next update.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • First Release

1.1.0

  • Plugin Update
  • Translation include

2.0

  • Update to latest version

short_description: This plugin is for quickly adding text or image before or after content.
